primevc.utils.Color

type
class

Static Variables

BLACK(inline,null) : UInt

WHITE(inline,null) : UInt

Static Methods

inline blend(v : primevc.types.RGBA, v2 : primevc.types.RGBA) : primevc.types.RGBA

Blends to RGBA colors together.

inline create(?r : UInt, ?g : UInt, ?b : UInt, ?a : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA object from single color values.

inline gray(v : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Creates a RGBA object containing gray values.

inline random() : primevc.types.RGBA

Returns a random color with an alpha value that is always 0xFF

inline validate(v : primevc.types.RGBA) : UInt

Makes sure that the given color is between BLACK and WHITE

inline validate24Bit(v : UInt) : UInt

inline validate8Bit(v : UInt) : UInt
